sentence.Network_en: He has been variously described as a hero, a genius and a bully.
sentence.Network_cn: 他被描述为英雄、天才、恶霸，不一而足。

sentence.Network_en: The figure of the Ancient Mariner has been variously interpreted.
sentence.Network_cn: 对于《古舟子咏》中的人物,一直有着各种各样的理解.

sentence.Network_en: The drug is variously known as crack or freebase.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种毒品的叫法五花八门,有人称为crack,也有人叫它freebase.

from a pure youth bolshevik to a cynical person who was mocked " clear up ideal " and " evade elevation " , Wang Meng show himself variously to investigators .从一个纯粹的少年布尔什维克到被人讥为“消解理想”、“躲避崇高”的“犬儒主义者”，王蒙呈现给文学研究者的是杂色的存在。
a dessert consisting of two or more layers of variously flavored ice cream frozen in a round or melon-shaped mold .瓜形甜点一种用两层或多层各种风味的冰淇淋做成的球形或瓜形的甜点
any of numerous hybrid begonias having tuberous roots and variously colored flowers .杂交的秋海棠，有块茎状根和各种颜色的花。
any of various North American plants of the genus Phlox , having opposite leaves and flowers with a variously colored salverform corolla .福禄考一种福禄考属北美植物，有对生的叶子和花，并有多种颜色的管状花冠

entry.def: You can use variously to introduce a number of different ways in which something can be described.

example.ex: ...the crowds, which were variously estimated at two to several thousand...
example.tran: 人数估计不一、从两千人到数千人不等的人群

example.ex: The family has been described variously as crass, bigoted, racist and plain boring.
example.tran: 人们对这家人有各种不同的评价：愚蠢、顽固、有种族偏见和无聊透顶，不一而足。

sentences.sentence: "the alternatives that are variously represented by the participants"
"the speakers treated the subject most diversely"

auth_sentence.content: The cardinals variously wore caps, birettas or, during Mass, mitre hats.
